12533211.title: Alternative Growing Scenario

choices: Ryona has an explosion of growth
125332111.content:
"I'm feeling kind of tired." Ryona said dully as she watched her sister and friends fend off the attacking Yoma. Normally she wouldn't hesitate to join them in the ensuing mania of combat, but the day's events had left her pretty worn out. All she could really do now was watch the beautiful ballet of moist skin, violence and cold steel as all present blurred across the pool.

The sounds of metal meeting metal rung like a gong, yet the heterochromatic blonde couldn't find it in her heart to care. That's when she spotted it, a small pink bag by her feet with a lone bottle sat next to it. "Why hell there little bottle, Are you lonely?" she asked aloud as she knelt down next to it, the battle being relegated to background noise.

"Don't worry, I'll drink you." she smiled as she unscrewed the cap. Ryona didn't know who the bag and bottle belonged too and she didn't really care all that much either. All she knew was that she was feeling a bit thirsty at the moment and anything would do. She didn't hesitate to start downing the unknown substance as suddenly her eyes began to widen. The bottle sure didn't taste like any juice, soda or water she was familiar with.

So it shouldn't have come as a surprise that she felt an odd sensation bubbling in her gut. She instantly dropped the now empty bottle as she felt a tingly sensation begin to run through her body. It was warm and pleasant, almost like when Ryobi spanked her when she managed to tie herself up. That memory made her smile. She was just masochistic like that.

Suddenly their was a loud explosion that echoed all throughout the large pool area. It covered the room and by extension her in a cool mist that had no doubt come from one of Yumi's attack. The ice queen sure was powerful. While that was going on Ryona felt her cloths beginning to tighten. Her blue bath robe and small-cloths felt rather constricting like a viper's vice. She really liked that.

Then she could hear the faint ripping of cloth. What was going on? She didn't know or fully understand, the mist kind of hid what was going on. All she knew for certain was that she'd somehow found herself in the pool. It was the only explanation that made sense considering she was suddenly surrounded by water. So why did it feel kind of shallow all of a sudden?

"Nice work Yumi-chan!" A voice called from the fog. No doubt that was Asuka. She always sounded excited like that around everyone. She'd tell her "hi" when the mist cleared. Speaking of the mist it seemed to be doing just that and things had gotten real quiet too. Was the battle over?

When the mist finally faded Ryona and everyone else present was greeted to a rather... odd sight. For the blonde it looked as if she was leaned down looking at doll-sized versions of her best friends. For her friends it was looking at a giant Ryona shaped balloon. She was huge, maybe fifty or sixty feet tall. Either way the reaction of all the girls present was a resounding, "What!?"

"H-Hey, Ryona!" Haruka called out in a panic. A rare emotion for her. "Did you take my experimental drug that makes anything bigger!? It's not complete!"

"Ryona, what the hell are you doing!" her sister growled in annoyance, a pulsing tick mark making itself known on her forehead.

Ryona on the other hand didn't feel the same sense of shock or panic as the other's did. Being large actually felt kind of nice. Not to mention she was enjoying the attention everyone was giving her large naked body. She actually stared giggling as she swayed her enlarged assets side to side like a pair of clackers. "Look how big I am! Isn't it amazing!?"

For girls like Mirai and Ryobi. The best envy was real. "No fair." The eyepatch girl whispered.

"You can say that again" Ryobi replied back. Both of them had the smallest boobs in the entire group. Even Lord Hanzo when borrowing Asuka's body wouldn't give them the time of day.

"This is no time for jokes!" Homura said from Ryobi's side. This was bad, really, really bad! Ryona was dangerous when normal sized. Now she was even more so super sized. Size plus masochism equal complete disaster.

The giant shinobi continued to giggle as her shadow loomed over the remaining enemies. The remaining Yoma looked hesitant to continue the battle. Unfortunately for them it would seem they would be the giant blondes first targets as her hand came down hard, completely crushing the unfortunate demon beneath it. "Hahahahaha! I'm like a monster attacking Tokyo!" The other Yoma fled but one was too slow and wound up being ensnared in her iron grip. "Go ahead and attack me, girls!"

"Haruka, what should we do!?" Ikaruga asked.

The other girl seemed surprised but quickly squashed the feeling. "Well, if we can get her to sweat a lot, the drug should wear off faster." At least she hoped so. Like she said it was still experimental and incomplete. On the one hand this was good field testing, on the other why did Ryona of all people have to be the guinea pig? Watching the giant giggle away without a care in the world while casually holding a deadly Yoma was truly terrifying.

"I get." Katsuragi smiled confidently. "The only thing we have to do is fight and make her work up a sweat."

"You're right!" Asuka agreed. "Girls, let's go!"

"Right!" They all cheered.

The fight was on.
125332111.title: Hello, Little Bottle

choices: Ryona is a mile in height
Ryona is big enough to fit the spa and city on her finger
1253321111.content:
"Let's dance!" Asuka shouted as she and the other girls ready their weapons to take down the opposing giant, golden energy swirling around their bodies like a raging a storm as they prepared themselves for an all out assault. In a flash they were off, peppering the looming giant with multiple strikes from all possible angles. They were so fast in fact that all that could be seen were blinding streaks of light.

Ryona for her part tanked every hit with joy clear on her face. She loved the feeling of being struck all over. Her friends weren't strong enough to break her skin or leave any marks, but the mild pain from the sharp steel they all carried put her in a state of complete an utter bliss.

"It's like your pricking my whole body with needles! This is heaven!" Ryona cried as she swayed her hips. Oh she hoped this would never end, that every single second of every day could be like this. She could feel them sticking her in all the right places from her chest down to her ass. Harder! She wanted to feel them to stick her even harder! She was caught up in her own euphoria that she didn't even realize her breasts were rapidly expanded.

"What's going on!? Her breasts are getting bigger!" Homura asked. She wasn't the only one noticing Ryona's knockers getting bigger, right?

The others began slashing away at the underside of her breasts with no clear results. It was if Ryona was nigh indestructible.

"Seriously, no fair." Mirai said.

"You can say that again." Ryobi repeated.

As the battle continued the poor little Yoma was left struggling in the giantess's grasp. It couldn't talk so it couldn't vocally voice it's displeasure, but soon it wouldn't matter. A shadow soon fell over the defenseless demon and it was left stunned as Ryona's free hand fell on top of it. It seconds it was crushed to death between her hands in a moment of bliss.

"More! Give me more!" Ryona cried happily, her arms expanding wide. "Blow me away!"

The snake-eyed girl Hikage was left alone on the other side of the pool watching the battle. She was the only one who wouldn't engage. In her usual monotone she could only voice everyone else's collective thoughts, "What a pervert."

The fighting seemed to grind to a screeching halt as the heterochromatic eyes of Ryona fell on her. He giant was panting like an animal in heat as her shadow completely consumed the green-haired girl. While anyone with common sense would be intimidated, Hikage was not. She simply stood her ground and waited as the enormous blonde continued to stare down.

"This is wonderful!" Ryona said as steam seemed to emanate from her body. Her breasts continued to grow and grow until finally they seemed to reach a breaking point. Then there was a flash of blinding white light. All the girls looked on anxious at what was about to happen as Ryona continued to pant as she felt a warm energy building in her chest. "I can't hold it anymore! AHHHHHH!!!"

The light grew even brighter than before, everyone actually had to shut their eyes lest they go blind. Then just like a bomb... Ryona exploded.

The blast was so powerful it actually blew the roof off the spa.

When the light faded and the dust finally settled the girls were left battered and bruised and sprawled out across the pool. "I see." Asuka winced as she addressed Yumi and Ikaruga. "So the great war you were talking about earlier was... was this?"

"No. The premonition I had... wasn't this joke of a battle." Yumi answered, also feeling the after effects of the battle.

Their conversation was soon interrupted by a bout of familiar and perverted giggles. All three girls eyes widen as they looked up towards the source and their jaws dropped.

"This really isn't good." Ikaruga wheezed.

No it really wasn't.

"So cool!"
1253321111.title: Blow Me Away!

131112.content:
Yumi woke up find that she was bound to a chair.
"Mmm?" she said, realizing the predicament she was in.

She struggled a bit, only to realize that she couldn't break the rope that she was tied with. Her ice powers didn't seem to be working, either.

Yumi looked around and tried to calmly asses the situation. She was in a dark room of some kind, with the only light in the room being directed at her. She couldn't see anything, except for a table with a cloth draped over it. The aroma of several different dishes came from underneath the cloth to greet Yumi's nose. Whatever was under that cloth smelled delicious.

"Oh? Finally awake, are we?"

A shadowy figure in a pink suit walked towards Yumi.

"Haruka? W-what's going on right-kyaaa!"

Yumi was interrupted by a different figure wrapping measuring tape around her breasts out of nowhere.

While Yumi couldn't see the figure, she could hear the sound of gears clanking from it. It must've been one of Haruka's puppets.

The puppet then proceeded to measure Yumi's waist and hips.

"Oh? Wondering what's going on, eh? Well, you see, I've decided to conduct a little experiment. The Crimson Squad is a little bit short on money, and I'm trying to discover a chemical that I can mix into our food that will make us feel full, even if all we eat is, say, a small bit of grass. Underneath this table is a variety of dishes mixed with a variety of different blends of this chemical. I want to try and discover which one won't make whoever eats it fat. I can't exactly do this to any of my teammates, so I figured that making you into my personal Guinea Pig should be alright. Any questions so far?"

Yumi blankly stared at Haruka.
"Two, actually. Why don't my powers work, and if you're too poor to buy too much food, then where'd you get all of the stuff underneath that cloth?"

"Good questions, sweetie! The sedatives that I knocked you out with also takes away your powers. You can have the antidote if you cooperate. As for the food, well, let's just say that I've been sneaking some cash out of Team Crimsons food fund for this little venture of ours. So, are you ready?"
131112.title: Experiment time!

info.brief_description: watch as Girls from Senran Kagura get big and large in many different ways
info.description:
Senran Kagura (閃乱カグラ?) is a side scrolling action video game series produced by Marvellous Entertainment for Nintendo 3DS. Senran Kagura is a side scrolling action game for the 3DS. The player will assume the control of 5 different female ninja characters. The more they are damaged by enemies, the more their clothes are torn off (as like in most fanservice-y anime/manga). The main focus of Senran Kagura are the aspects of ninja and the integration of such into a high-school/modern day setting as the female cast secretly train the ninja arts.


+Fetishes that can appear during this story...+
- Stuffing/Weight Gain
- Pregnancy
- body expansions(Breast, Belly, Butt, or all)
- gaintess
- Vore


Standard rules apply...
- Only female characters are to expand. Although this doesn't exclude male characters from appearing at all in the interactive.
- Please put forth effort in your chapters.
- Nothing completely outlandish in regards of expansion.
- Let's try to avoid the overly gross situations such as toilet stuff and the like. Burps are fine (farts too, if you play it for comedy), but nothing past that please.
- This is an 18+ interactive so sexual situations are allowed, just...try not to go overboard with them. Use in moderation, basically and try not to have the story revolve too much around it.
